the_warlord:FencingBoots.NAME: Fencing Boots
the_warlord:FencingBoots.FLAVOR: You are the fencing queen, young and ascension 17...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b2 the_warlord:Posture.

the_warlord:MedicPouch.NAME: Medic Pouch
the_warlord:MedicPouch.FLAVOR: A Swordfight a day keeps the doctor away! Or does it?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add #b2 #ySyrettes to your hand.

the_warlord:PocketKnife.NAME: Pocket Knife
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now have #b4 Parry cards instead of #b3 to choose from.

the_warlord:FencingGloves.NAME: Fencing Gloves
DESCRIPTIONS: When you Parry, gain 1 Reaction Time.

the_warlord:FeatherBoots.NAME: Feather Boots
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplaces #rFencing #rBoots. NL At the start of combat, gain #b2 the_warlord:Reaction Time

the_warlord:SamuraiSword.NAME: Samurai Sword
the_warlord:SamuraiSword.FLAVOR: The last of the 7 famous swords.
